name: unsparingly
content:
unsparingly adverb
(HIDING NOTHING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows no kindness or no wish to hide unpleasant truths : unsparingly honest He is unsparingly honest in everything he writes. Miller's photographs unsparingly addressed the destruction and death she had witnessed.
More examplesFewer examplesWestern society is observed minutely and unsparingly.

unsparingly adverb
(GENEROUSLY)
in a way that is extremely generous with money, time, help, etc. : I am very greatly indebted to you for the help you gave so unsparingly. He devoted himself unsparingly to the care of the sick. She gave unsparingly of her time and energy in order to help her community.
